title: february 23: the polio vaccine
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the first mass inoculation event against the polio virus. Then, Maia talks about how on this day in 2006, the iTunes Music Store reached 1 billion songs sold. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
